NOTES:
Firstly top marks to MM for having the balls to go and film this.....big time respect to you ;-)
Right for a cam this is great...good picture and audio...
The picture is slightly on the blue side but still good.....like most original sources there&#039;s cropping to be
done all round the picture because on most sources until there fixed you&#039;ll see the cinema walls etc....


WORK DONE:
Well firstly i had to split the file into 3 due to camera movement so i could crop it has it need to be cropped.
The video has been made brighter and more colourful .....by increasing the lum,gamma,contrast,chroma...
also lowered the black base to tone down the white/bright spots.
Also had to deinterlace the original has it was badly interlaced,which is common with camcorders.
Audio for a cam was pretty good so i&#039;ve done no work to it.

Ps PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD MY RELEASES IF YOU DON&#039;T LIKE RE-ENCODES OR IF YOU THINK BY SOME
HOW ME RE-ENCODING THEM IS GOING TO MAKE THEM LOOK LIKE R5&#039;S....BECAUSE THEY DON&#039;T!!!!!

Anyway enjoy the movie,it&#039;s free!!!!
